com.example.ceandroid

Class ExpressionTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.ceandroid.ExpressionTree

  • public class ExpressionTree
extends Object
    Uses the tree string stored in a rule to build a tree, fills leaf nodes with rCause objects, and evaluates/returns a result
    Author:
    CEandroid SMU

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      Nodes for tree building.

        root node of the tree

        Debug purposes, prints the tree

      • printPreOrder

        private void printPreOrder(ExpressionTree.TreeNode node)
        Debug purposes - prints the tree using recursive methods
        Parameters:
        node - starts with root and passes next node to print child values

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns:
        number of nodes in the tree

      • getSize

        private int getSize(ExpressionTree.TreeNode node,
          int count)
        Recursively counts number of nodes in a tree
        Parameters:
        node - used for recursive calling
        count - increments as nodes are visited
        Returns:
        number of nodes in the tree

      • evaluate

        public boolean evaluate(Context context)
        Evaluates the tree, calls recursive function
        Parameters:
        context - allows access to application resources
        Returns:
        boolean result

      • evaluate

        private boolean evaluate(ExpressionTree.TreeNode node)
        Evaluates the tree and returns the result. Fills in the leaf nodes with rCauses for values and uses their isTrue() method to get a value for them.
        Parameters:
        node - needed for recursive call
        Returns:
        boolean result
